title: Drawing, "Distant View of Sangay Volcano Erupting, Ecuador", 1857–62
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457C
inscribed: Inscribed with accounts and/or possibly partial date at lower right:  8/ 30   /4
description: Horizontal view across ridges in the foreground and middleground with volcano, visible in the central background, giving off clouds of smoke in already cloudy sky.  Framing lines surround the image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Distant View of Sangay Volcano Erupting, Ecuador", 1857–62.
1857–62. Graphite on white paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-401-b.
